components.name: API Server
components.description: Handles requests from clients, manages application logic, and interacts with the database.

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores application data, user information, and deployment configurations. Supports multiple database types.

components.name: Frontend Dashboard
components.description: User interface for managing applications, databases, and monitoring resources.

components.name: Docker Management
components.description: Manages Docker containers for application deployment and scaling.

components.name: Notification Service
components.description: Sends notifications about deployment status and other events to users via various channels.

data_flows.description: User actions in the dashboard trigger API calls to manage applications and databases.
The API server queries and updates the database based on user requests and application logic.
The API server sends commands to the Docker management service to deploy or scale applications.
The API server triggers notifications to inform users about deployment success or failure.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary separating user data from application logic and external services.

trust_boundaries.name: Deployment Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between the application management layer and the underlying infrastructure.
